WorkCapacityLimit.name: WorkCapacityLimit
WorkCapacityLimit.description: Represents the capacity limit in a specific service territory for a workstream or for the whole service territory in a given period.

CapacityLimitRelaxation.description: Defines the relaxation behavior that determines the limit override policy for this limit if the limit override policy is set per limit in Field Service Settings. If the limit override policy isn’t set per limit, this value is ignored. Valid strings are:

Description.description: Description of the work capacity limit.

EndDate.description: End date of the work capacity limit. If no EndDate is set this work capacity limit is without an expiration date.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the work capacity limit is active or inactive. When creating a record, save the record, and then activate it. You can't update fields in an active record.

IsFriday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Fridays.

IsMonday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Mondays.

IsSaturday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Saturdays.

IsSunday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Sundays.

IsSvcTerrOnlyLimit.description: Apply this work capacity limit to the entire service territory.

IsThursday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Thursdays.

IsTuesday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Tuesdays.

IsWednesday.description: Indicates whether the limitation is applied on Wednesdays.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate isn’t null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LimitationValue.description: If the LimitationUnits is Hours, LimitationValue is the threshold that represents how many hours of total work capacity can be scheduled for a specific workstream in a service territory. Enter the number of hours for the daily limitation as a whole number.

OwnerId.description: ID of the creator of the work capacity limit.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: ID of the service territory of the work capacity workstream for which the limit is defined.

StartDate.description: The start date of the Work Capacity Limit.

SvcApptField.description: Work-specific criteria used to define the capacity limit for the workstream. The service appointment field is set for the organization when the first work capacity limit instance is created.

SvcApptFieldValDplyNm.description: The workstream display name of SvcApptFieldValue. If SvcApptField is a lookup to a service appointment, SvcApptFieldValue is an ID and the display name describes the value for the user.

SvcApptFieldValue.description: The value of SvcApptField, the work-specific criteria of the capacity limit.

TimePeriod.description: Duration for defining the capacity limitation on the workstream in the service territory.

WorkCapacityLimitNumber.description: Read-only. Auto populated, unique identifying number.
